Posts.EditableText:
I started working on a new game using Quest a few hours ago. I saved my process and took a break. Now, when I reopen the game to edit it further, nothing loads. I've been sitting at the "Loading..." screen in quest for an hour. I've attempted opening the Quest editor in multiple browsers (I primarily use Firefox, but I've tried opening in Safari and Chrome to no avail). I also created another 'Test' game to see if that would open in the editor and I have the same problem.

TL;DR: I've been staring at the "loading..." screen when I open the Quest editor for an hour -- can anyone help me?

Posts.EditableText: Not sure what the issue was but it seems to be loading fine now.
